ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
CodeDisplay
Q9-1Absent (movements within normal range, e.g., occasionally shifts position in seat)
Q9-2Mild (Doubtful or slight agitation, mild restlessness,e.g., frequently changing position in seat, foottapping, playing with hair, hands, or clothes)
Q9-3Moderate (Moderate to marked restlessness or agitation, e.g., wringing hands, excessive scratching or picking)
Q9-4Severe (Cannot sit still or stay seated even for a short period of time; pacing)
Q9-5Very Severe (Interview cannot be conducted)

description.value: ValueSet including Q9 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.

display.value: Absent (movements within normal range, e.g., occasionally shifts position in seat)
Mild (Doubtful or slight agitation, mild restlessness,e.g., frequently changing position in seat, foottapping, playing with hair, hands, or clothes)
Moderate (Moderate to marked restlessness or agitation, e.g., wringing hands, excessive scratching or picking)
Severe (Cannot sit still or stay seated even for a short period of time; pacing)
